description: A front-end HTML file for a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets view.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show tables and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds an HTML table from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Returns HTML for a cell, handling long content and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expansion of cell content for long strings or objects.
